parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF:11240014), indicating it's likely electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly refers to Dan Cosma, a candidate for the AUR party, mentioning his position on the ballot (position 1).</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, it's clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just personal contacts. The message uses inclusive language ("Dragi prieteni, camarazi și toți cei care cred într-un viitor mai bun").</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective is to encourage voters to vote for Dan Cosma and the AUR party. Phrases like "Un vot pentru viitorul nostru," "Haideți la urne!", and "La parlamentare, votați AUR" directly promote voting for a specific candidate and party.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks objective reporting, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it promotes a specific political viewpoint and candidate.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clear call to action for electoral support.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1551664468825639</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It directly refers to a candidate (Dan Cosma), is used during the electoral campaign period (although the end date is specified, it's unclear if this is after the official end of the campaign), has a clear electoral objective (influencing votes for AUR), and goes beyond journalistic reporting by explicitly advocating for a specific candidate.  The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The paid nature of the Facebook post and its broad reach confirm its intention to influence public opinion.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate>
    <name>DAN COSMA</name>
    <impact>POSITIVE</impact>
  </candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>AUR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[Entitatea responsabilă de postare], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 1551664468825639) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care constituie propagandă electorală interzisă. Postarea, care a beneficiat de o cheltuială de RON 100-RON 199 și a atins o audiență de peste 1 milion de persoane, promovează explicit candidatul Dan Cosma (AUR), solicitând voturi pentru acesta și pentru partid, folosind fraze precum „Un vot pentru viitorul nostru”, „Haideți la urne!”, și „La parlamentare, votați AUR”.  Prezența numărului CMF:11240014 confirmă natura electorală a postării.  Aceste acțiuni au un efect electoral clar, vizând influențarea voturilor în favoarea lui Dan Cosma și AUR, încălcând astfel prevederile legale privind interzicerea propagandei electorale după încheierea perioadei legale.  Informațiile de contact ale advertiserului sunt: cosdan63@gmail.com și +407666663210.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
